original_title: ハロプロ プレミアム アンジュルム コンサートツアー 2019春 ファイナル 和田彩花卒業スペシャル 輪廻転生 ～あるとき生まれた愛の提唱～
overview: The tour finished on June 18 at Nippon Budokan with the Hello Pro Premium ANGERME Concert Tour 2019 Haru Final Wada Ayaka Sotsugyou Special Rinnetenshou ~Aru Toki Umareta Ai no Teishou~ (ハロプロ プレミアム アンジュルム コンサートツアー 2019春 ファイナル 和田彩花卒業スペシャル 輪廻転生 〜あるとき生まれた愛の提唱〜; ANGERME Concert Tour 2019 Spring Final Wada Ayaka Graduation Special Reincarnation ~When an Advocacy for Love Was Born~), where 1st generation member and leader Wada Ayaka graduated from ANGERME and Hello! Project. The concert was broadcasted live on Fuji TV TWO.  The DVD and Blu-ray of Wada's graduation concert were released on October 30, 2019. The Blu-ray includes a second disc with footage following Wada and a live photobooklet.
tagline: Wada Ayaka Sotsugyou Special Rinnetenshou ~Aru Toki Umareta Ai no Teishou~
title: ANGERME Concert Tour 2019 Haru Final
